verses.verse: It happened after <WH310> these things, <WH1697> that someone said <WH559> to Joseph, <WH3130> "Behold, <WH1> your father is sick. <WH2470>" He took <WH3947> with him his two <WH8147> sons, <WH1121> Manasseh <WH4519> and Ephraim. <WH669>

Someone told <WH5046> Jacob, <WH3290> and said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH1121> your son Joseph <WH3130> comes <WH935> to you, <WH3478>" and Israel strengthened <WH2388> himself, <WH3427> and sat on the bed. <WH4296>
Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> to Joseph, <WH3130> "God <WH410> Almighty <WH7706> appeared <WH7200> to me at Luz <WH3870> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and blessed me, <WH1288>

and said <WH559> to me, <WH6509> 'Behold, I will make you fruitful, and multiply <WH7235> you, <WH5414> and I will make of you a company <WH6951> of peoples, <WH5971> and will give <WH5414> this land <WH776> to your seed <WH2233> after you <WH310> for an everlasting <WH5769> possession. <WH272>'

Now your two <WH8147> sons, <WH1121> who were born <WH3205> to you in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> before <WH5704> I came <WH935> to you into Egypt, <WH4714> are mine; <WH669> Ephraim and Manasseh, <WH4519> even as Reuben <WH7205> and Simeon, <WH8095> will be mine.

Your issue, <WH4138> whom you become the father <WH3205> of after <WH310> them, <WH7121> will be yours. They will be called after <WH5921> the name <WH8034> of their brothers <WH251> in their inheritance. <WH5159>

As for me, <WH935> when I came from Paddan, <WH6307> Rachel <WH7354> died <WH4191> by me in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667> in the way, <WH1870> when <WH5750> there was still some <WH3530> distance <WH776> to come <WH935> to Ephrath, <WH672> and I buried her <WH6912> there in the way <WH1870> to Ephrath <WH672> (the same is Bethlehem <WH1035>)."
Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> Joseph <WH3130>'s sons, <WH1121> and said, <WH559> "Who are these?"

Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to his father, <WH1> "They are my sons, <WH1121> whom God <WH430> has given <WH5414> me here. <WH559>" He said, "Please bring them <WH3947> to me, <WH1288> and I will bless them."

Now the eyes <WH5869> of Israel <WH3478> were dim <WH3513> for age, <WH2207> so that he couldn't <WH3201> see. <WH7200> He brought them near <WH5066> to him; <WH5401> and he kissed them, <WH2263> and embraced them.
Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> to Joseph, <WH3130> "I didn't <WH6419> think I would see <WH7200> your face, <WH6440> and behold, <WH7200> God <WH430> has let me see your seed also. <WH2233>"
Joseph <WH3130> brought them out <WH3318> from between <WH5973> his knees, <WH1290> and he bowed <WH7812> himself with his face <WH639> to the earth. <WH776>

Joseph <WH3130> took <WH3947> them both, <WH8147> Ephraim <WH669> in his right hand <WH3225> toward Israel <WH3478>'s left hand, <WH8040> and Manasseh <WH4519> in his left hand <WH8040> toward Israel <WH3478>'s right hand, <WH3225> and brought them near to him. <WH5066>

Israel <WH3478> stretched out <WH7971> his right hand, <WH3225> and laid <WH7896> it on Ephraim <WH669>'s head, <WH7218> who was the younger, <WH6810> and his left hand <WH8040> on Manasseh <WH4519>'s head, <WH7218> guiding <WH7919> his hands <WH3027> knowingly, <WH7919> for Manasseh <WH4519> was the firstborn. <WH1060>

He blessed <WH1288> Joseph, <WH3130> and said, <WH559> "The God <WH430> before <WH6440> whom my fathers <WH1> Abraham <WH85> and Isaac <WH3327> walked, <WH1980> the God <WH430> who has fed <WH7462> me all my life long <WH5750> to this day, <WH3117>

the angel <WH4397> who has redeemed <WH1350> me from all evil, <WH7451> bless <WH1288> the lads, <WH5288> and let my name <WH8034> be named <WH7121> on them, <WH8034> and the name of my fathers <WH1> Abraham <WH85> and Isaac. <WH3327> Let them grow <WH1711> into a multitude <WH7230> in the midst <WH7130> of the earth. <WH776>"

When Joseph <WH3130> saw <WH7200> that his father <WH1> laid <WH7896> his right <WH3225> hand <WH3027> on the head <WH7218> of Ephraim, <WH669> it displeased <WH3415> him. <WH8551> He held up his father <WH1>'s hand, <WH3027> to remove <WH5493> it from Ephraim <WH669>'s head <WH7218> to Manasseh <WH4519>'s head. <WH7218>
Joseph <WH3130> said <WH559> to his father, <WH1> "Not so, <WH1> my father; for this is the firstborn; <WH1060> put <WH7760> your right hand <WH3225> on his head. <WH7218>"

His father <WH1> refused, <WH3985> and said, <WH559> "I know, <WH3045> my son, <WH1121> I know. <WH3045> He also will become a people, <WH5971> and he also will be great. <WH1431> However, <WH199> his younger <WH6996> brother <WH251> will be greater <WH1431> than he, <WH2233> and his seed will become a multitude <WH4393> of nations. <WH1471>"

He blessed <WH1288> them that day, <WH3117> saying, <WH559> "In you will Israel <WH3478> bless, <WH1288> saying, <WH559> <WH430> 'God make <WH7760> you as Ephraim <WH669> and as Manasseh <WH4519>'" He set <WH7760> Ephraim <WH669> before <WH6440> Manasseh. <WH4519>
Israel <WH3478> said <WH559> to Joseph, <WH3130> "Behold, <WH4191> I am dying, but God <WH430> will be with you, <WH7725> and bring you again to the land <WH776> of your fathers. <WH1>

Moreover I have given <WH5414> to you one <WH259> portion <WH7926> above your brothers, <WH251> which I took <WH3947> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Amorite <WH567> with my sword <WH2719> and with my bow. <WH7198>"
